show supremo Simon Cowell wants to give her a role on the US programme when it launches later this year, even if network Fox block her appointment as a panellist. A source told The Sun newspaper: Simon Cowell desperately wants Cheryl Cole to be a judge but if that's knocked back by Fox chiefs the next option is to start her as a mentor.`` It would be a way to test how she's received in America.
